title: Capacitance and energy of isolated parallel plates

content.question: Charges Q of equal magnitude and opposite sign are on the plates of an isolated parallel-plate capacitor of capacitance C. The voltage between the plates is V, and the energy stored in the capacitor is U. If Q is doubled and C is not changed, how are V and U affected?

choices.label:
V
 U

Not changed
 Not changed

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
